text: Air Vice Marshal Robert P. O'Brien, is a former senior commander in the Royal Air Force who served as Air Secretary from 1994 until his retirement in 1998. ==RAF career== O'Brien joined the Royal Air Force in 1963. He became Commandant of the Joint Service Defence College in 1992,Whitaker's Almanack 1993 and Air Secretary in 1994 before retiring in 1998. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Royal Air Force air marshals Category:Companions of the Order of the Bath Category:Officers of the Order of the British Empire Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Robert O'Brien (RAF officer)
